name: Self-Actualization
description:
This is my first time making a game, so hopefully it's not to bad. I hope to come back in due time and make it 3d. Description of the game below.

Experience the journey of a man fixing himself and regaining lost memories of who he is, why he is, and how he achieves his own, Self-Actualization. Simply click the options at the bottom of the text to choose which action you would like to do, read them, and repeat. There is a ending, and it will make itself known
